Simple Body Foaming Face Wash, Rose

Brand: Simple Body

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: aqua, rose damascena (ROSE) floral water, potassium sorbate, lactic acid, coco glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine, vegetable glycerin, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, water*

Directions: Apply cleanser twice daily to your face using a silicone brush

ng a silicone brush or hands
in a circular motion. Follow with toner or tonic, serums and moisturizers.

Warnings: A patch test for skin sensitivity is recommended. Discontinue use if irritation
occurs. If product comes in direct contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. The safety
of this product has not been determined. For external use onl

For external use only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
